title: The American Night: The Lost Writings, Vol. 2
description: The celebrated lead singer of The Doors, Jim Morrison is a legend of rock and roll.Â  The American Night presents Morrison's previously unpublished work in its truest form. With their nightmarish images, bold associative leaps, and volcanic power of emotion, these works are the unmistakable artifacts of a great, wild voice and heart.
author: Jim Morrison
